alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 5:53PM EDT until July 12 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Delaware County in central New York... Northeastern Sullivan County in central New York... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 552 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Livingston Manor, or 8 miles northwest of Liberty, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rockland, Liberty, Neversink, South Fallsburg, Jeffersonville, Parksville, Loch Sheldrake, Hazel, Grahamsville and Willowemoc. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
